bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Pole-Mounted Equipment -Enclosure Integrity for Coastal Environments
IEEE Draft Standard for Pole-Mounted Equipment -Enclosure Integrity for Coastal Environments
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC57.12.30_D5, Nov 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Conformance tests and requirements for the coating integrity of pole mounted enclosures for application in coastal environments containing apparatus energized in excess of 600 volts, typically located out of reach of the general public, including, but not limited to, the following types of equipment enclosures: pole mounted distribution transformers, pole-mounted switches, pole-mounted regulators, pole-mounted metering equipment, pole-mounted reclosers, and pole-mounted switchgear.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
